comment._content: Here is Bridget Phelan, 36, in the 1901 census..

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/gnmcauley] This woman could be 36. Do you think it is Bridget Phelan?
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: Yes, I think it is very likely, she's right there in Kilnagrange. Either this is Bridget, or Bridget (36) ordered a copy of a photo of another woman her own age.
